seo.title_override: Phoenix AZ Mattress Disposal Guide 2026 | Easy & Legal
seo.meta_desc_override: Avoid Phoenix's hefty $2,500 illegal dumping fine! Our 2026 guide covers legal mattress disposal options, including curbside pickup and recycling, for Phoenix, AZ residents.

hero_hook: Avoid the hassle and potential $2,500 fine when getting rid of your old mattress in the dry Phoenix heat.
neighborhoods: Arcadia, Biltmore, Camelback East, Downtown Phoenix, Encanto, Garfield, Coronado, Roosevelt Row, Willo, Alhambra, Laveen, Maryvale, Ahwatukee Foothills, Deer Valley, North Mountain

curbside_rules.mattress_specific_rule: Materials such as furniture, small appliances, toilets, and large amounts of vegetation are often considered bulk trash.
curbside_rules.placement_time: Have your items placed by 5:30 a.m. on your scheduled appointment date. Make sure you have your appointment scheduled before you begin placing your bulk items at the curb (no more than 7 days ahead of your scheduled date). It is a violation of city ordinance to place trash out more than 7 days before your scheduled appointment.
curbside_rules.size_limits: Set bulk items out in a single pile no larger than ten (10) cubic yards per residence​ (all material should be placed no more than 5 feet from the street/curb or front edge of the property). Cut tree trimmings down to less than 12 inches in diameter and 4 feet in length​. Don't Include: More than ten (10) cubic yards of bulk trash per residence. More than 2 wooden pallets. Materials such as bricks, concrete, dirt, rocks, asphalt, and roofing shingles/tiles. Construction or demolition materials in excess of 25 pounds or over four feet long. Metal or car parts in excess of 20 pounds or over four feet long. Tires, any shape or size. Glass such as windows, shower doors, patio doors, mirrors, fluorescent tubes, etc. Tree trunks or stumps longer than 4 feet and bigger than 12 inches in diameter. Large appliances that use refrigerants such as freezers, refrigerators and air conditioners.
curbside_rules.the_catch: There are specific guidelines that must be followed or we cannot collect bulk trash from your property. Customers will have four (4) collection opportunities each year. Appointments that are canceled at least 3 business days ahead of time will not count against your four total appointments for the year. Do not place pile on top of water meters. Keep pile at least 5 feet aw
